Shadimus Prime felt a chill, a dark, evil, cancerous
chill, a chill that felt like it wanted to seek out
and paralyse every inch of his being with fear, and as
he felt it, he knew that time was a precious luxury he
no longer had.  With steely determination, he forced
his focus into a tight path, carreening his way down,
back past previous leaders who blurred past him like
trees travelled past on a Terran highway.   Finally he
found what he was looking for, Primus himself, or at
least part of him.

"Welcome my child, it seems the connection to the
Matrix I left within you worked perfectly. We haven't
much time left- the future hinges upon you. I know
your fears, and what you are thinking, and the answers
to both are yes. I will open up a spark channel
between you and I. Remember that even though you are
my eyes, my ears, my voice and my hand, I am always
watching over you.  I give you the choice of warrios,
both Autobot and Decepticon to recruit, in their
original forms to combat the oncoming menace. Any who
wish to remain with you after the conflict here on
this ancient Terra must be reformatted. Now just name
the warriors you wish to recruit and they will be
yours."

OOC: To be continued in Sparks of Destiny
